short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Manage and switch between multiple proxies quickly & easily.
short.cs: Správa a přepínání mezi více proxy servery .
short.fa: مدیریت و تعویض سریع و آسان بین چندین پیشکار.
short.zh_CN: 轻松快捷地管理和切换多个代理设置。
short.zh_TW: 輕鬆簡單地管理並切換多個代理伺服器設定。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manage and switch between multiple proxies quickly and easily with this modern proxy management tool.

SwitchyOmega makes changing proxy settings simple and efficient, optimized specifically for Chrome. Say goodbye to navigating through Chrome’s advanced settings or repeatedly configuring proxy settings in your operating system. Just add your proxies, and switch effortlessly via the popup menu. Auto Switch can also be set up to select the right proxy automatically based on website rules.

Please report issues by right-clicking the extension icon and selecting "Report Issue" for faster resolution.

This extension does not include proxy servers or VPNs. You’ll need to configure it with your own trusted proxy servers to benefit from its features.

Privacy Policy: https://github.com/mrfanii/SwitchyOmega-V3/wiki/Privacy#english

Key Features:
- HTTP/HTTPS proxy authentication.
- Flexible proxy configurations with rule-based switching.
- Performance optimizations for faster switching and rule execution.
- Enhanced user experience and bug fixes.

For translation contributions, visit: https://hosted.weblate.org/engage/switchyomega/?utm_source=widget.
